issue.title: [Rust] Cast UTF8 to Date64 Incorrect
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10907](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10907). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current UTF8 to Date64 Cast behavior is incorrect in that it works on a `%Y-%m-%d` rather than `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10907?focusedCommentId=17249968) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8918
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8918>
